documents.document: @jdizzlenz Send some of that goodness down to Wellington please! It's raining here.. again.
The most amazing perfect flat came up today, messaged them straight away and still didn't even get a viewing. So disheartening :(
Another flat missed ðŸ‘ŽðŸ¼ room taken by a friend of the people already living there.
Went to check my lotto ticket ($15M yes please?!) and got this message. Ummm since when do apps "close"? https://t.co/mUjT0ka8dn
Backyard drinks in the sun. Summer is back.
I'm in the draw, are you? - https://t.co/ZqDvDJBIoO
Get dat Sorted cash!! https://t.co/GbD5JQoDct
@GeorgeMachinNZ @thatkatierose No worries, glad you found someone quickly!
The universe has told me off for breaking my no sugar rule by setting fire to the cookie I put in the microwave. Whoops.
It's the middle of summer and people are being told to avoid leaving their houses because of the massive storm happening. Jfc NZ.
@jdizzlenz Not all that surprising, my town has been on it multiple times in the past so ðŸ˜‚
@jdizzlenz Burn down all the houses that reject me ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥
@jdizzlenz Hopefully I win! ðŸ˜‚ ðŸ”ªðŸ”«ðŸ’£
@thatkatierose Thanks! Checking out a spot on manners on Thursday that looks promising. Time will tell :)
Another viewing on Thursday. This one feels good ðŸ™ðŸ¼
@thatkatierose Yeah totally! That one had over 200 people contact them about it ðŸ˜¨ but I made it to the 14 who got aâ€¦ https://t.co/jL4MNsQT7g
When you find an apartment with a balcony off the bedroom :o PLEASE PICK ME.
And I've officially had my first flat rejection. Let the games begin.
Put my name down for a lecture on hate speech. The professor's name is Wolfgang, how could I not?
Never underestimate the power of a good hug.
@xoShaaan lil roast chook ðŸ¥
Trying to find a room in town at this time of year is an absolute nightmare.
@AWHape I got slapped in the face by a tie today. Thanks men.
The internal battle continues. To move out or stay home and save money for travel. Selling my car might make this easier.
Drunk crying is the worst crying but it's worth it when it's for an amazing friend.
I don't want to but I must. Today is the day to take down the Christmas tree. /endfestiveseason
I'm thinking Cable Car > Cuba > Fidel's > Leeds/Eva St > Te Papa > waterfront > maybe Beehive/Parliament area if time > back to the shuttle.
The rain is not helping.
Got friends coming in on the cruise ship tomorrow. Planning to try and "do Wellington" in 4.5 hours is proving to be difficult.
Randomly go onto @jack_p 's account and balloons appear - Happy Birthday dude! ðŸŽ‚
Go in the draw to WIN the ultimate #WellingtonCup prize pack. Simply enter your details & you're in the draw. https://t.co/efYLnjtvxl
Ugh earthquake. No thank you.
Can't get someone off my mind. Wish they were back in Wellington already.
@catthesheep Yeah I actually need to have a pedicure for that reason
@catthesheep Hahah no thanks! I hate peioke touching my feet
@catthesheep Oh aheeeeeeit. What you doing today? I'm just about to head into the city
@catthesheep Yeah we're hanging out homie! Are you free before New Years though or working every day?
Trying to catch up with people over the holidays: "oh that person is away, so is that person, they're down south, they're overseas" fuck me
Moments before the car pulled a pot plant off the window sill.. https://t.co/AbmtTHyULq
@AlmightyAllan @lyallbaynz @Houghton_Bay @MetService Mine is not quite as great but it was magical! https://t.co/jSMmvqOnYL
No plans and shitty weather = movie day ðŸ™ŒðŸ¼
Ninja move into the bedroom to shut the door before the cat follows in. Sorry Ngaio I don't want you to sleep on my face ðŸ˜‚
Snapchat filters really are magical. https://t.co/TMbInrlXlI
2 couples on Facebook got engaged today and I'm just lying on the couch eating salt and vinegar chips in sweatpants. #singlesloblife
It's not Christmas with brandy snaps that almost break your teeth.
Who needs need a store-bought pav when you have me? ðŸ“ðŸ¥ #firsteverpavlova #nailedit #somodestâ€¦ https://t.co/v6LDVsVcC8
@catthesheep Woohoo can't wait!
@catthesheep Thanks hun, it's okay. Only a minor blip in what's an otherwise alright day :)
Okay I am done with Christmas. Time to drive back, open a bottle of wine and drink away my sorrows.
Christmas Day is the only time you can get away with putting an unhealthy amount of cream inâ€¦ https://t.co/R0V3cORYtB
Already managed to spill the wine ðŸ˜‚ haven't even had breakfast. Merry Christmas everyone!
Patiently waiting for my @RedditGifts #SecretSanta gift to show up.. so fucking excited.
I feel like I need to take up boxing to handle the strong emotions I'm feeling right now.
Writing my pre-Christmas day shopping list. So far I have wine, Bailey's and cheese.
3.5 more days until Christmas break. I need this.
Knowing I have to go to work with trash panda face.. fuck
I've spent almost the last hour trying to fix my stupid car radio and I can't find out how to change the language or get my stations back. ðŸ˜¡
@AWHape I absolutely love this picture!
My mind is spinning. What an evening.
I'm having ghost Santa hat problems.
When you get off work early but the train is late leaving the station. Pls Metlink give me this.
Six more days. Only six more days.
Leaving work early on a Wednesday after a massive Christmas lunch and lovely afternoon walk in the sun - perfect ðŸ‘ŒðŸ¼
@Challumger I've never had it but was trying to get it for someone for Secret Santa
@Challumger Oooh I'll give them a look!
Anyone know where one can purchase German gingerbread in Wellington?
@RS_Tjphotos Such s great Monday task!
Nothing like setting an extra early alarm for Monday morning so you can go get new tyres before work. Get out car.
@DrunkMilesLuna Basically my spirit animal.
Black Mirror is so excellent, and yet I'm totally fine with just watching one episode tonight. Fucked me up.
Oh shit. She has a friend with a 1.
There's a girl walking around Courtenay place with a huge gold 2 balloon. It's great.
The only bus on the real time display isn't until 1:30am.. hoping with all my power that the 12am bus actually shows up.
ðŸŽðŸŒ² oh christmas tree ðŸŒ²ðŸŽ https://t.co/v4wKDuy00I
Guy next to me on the bus is singing. I'm posting this bunny to make myself feel more comfortable with the situatioâ€¦ https://t.co/ndvBaPfxim
I think the underwire in my bra broke and this may be the worst thing to ever happen.
Almost fell asleep on the train feel real disoriented waiting for the bus. Must move into town.
Our external designers just delivered ice cream as a Christmas treat. I love Christmas. â¤ï¸
I've just entered the Cheapflights' Xmas travel competition! Fingers crossed I win... https://t.co/H0ItKDWxbj
@Bioghosty thanks, me too! The energy has just been completely zapped from me
I've been hit with the dreaded bug that seems to be going around our office. Going home to hide in my bed and feel sorry for myself.
So proud of the lovely @alexbengree for her achievement tonight. Well deserved x #localhero https://t.co/hGXigZIPsi
Yesterday's earthquake: everything starts rattling but I don't feel the shaking. Have I become one with the earthquakes? ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤”
@femkesvs I just got one for my birthday so I'm spying on your replies ðŸ‘€
@NinjaMarion thanks â¤ï¸
Feeling like a Sunday slob right now, but at least I got a nice picture before heading to theâ€¦ https://t.co/8FjTgDjJdo
Just got home from an excellent evening at the Weta Christmas party. So lucky to have amazing friends who invite me. What an experience!
@kaleidocopia @NinjaMarion happy birthday to you too! :D
@NinjaMarion @kaleidocopia Thanks! :D
I have to buy a cake on the way to work tomorrow. I hate myself.
Almost threw a knife across the kitchen. Baking is one thing I'm so passionate about and I can't stand when it goes wrong.
There must be more. They can't leave it like that. I need more. #GilmoreGirls #GilmoreGirlsRevival
HOLY SHIT GILMORE GIRLS. I need answers.
@WhittakersNZ so many options to choose from and they're all creamy/melty and delicious â˜ºï¸
So Facebook messenger is now trying to be snapchat. Okay. https://t.co/nQmm54I2mM
My dinner tonight is a protein shake and some mashed potato. I am an animal.
At a workshop in a hotel and some poor guy in the room next door just threw up in the hall. Allergic to pineapple apparently :(
A door that beeps every 3 seconds when open was open all day at work. I swear the constant beeping is seared into my brain forever now.
Every time I try tidy my inbox, I feel like I do it for hours and make no progress. I should just make sure I delete them straight away!
Amazing work. Happy to have contributed to a great cause. #RTExtraLife https://t.co/YLHjK9ry1d
